EmailTemplate.name: RS - Contract Receipt
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave - Contract Receipt and Welcome!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
Your BlueWave Solar Loan contract has been received and fully executed. You should receive it from DocuSign shortly.
If you do not receive the fully executed contract in your email, or if you have any further questions, please contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or call us at (888) 817 - 2703 to access a member of our Customer Care team.
You will receive an invitation to access BlueWave's Member Portal shortly. In this portal you can stay up to date on your energy savings and the latest BlueWave news.
Welcome to BlueWave!
Sincerely,
BlueWave Customer Care
